com.persado.oss.quality.stevia.selenium.core.controllers.factories

Interface WebControllerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeleniumWebControllerFactoryImpl, WebDriverWebControllerFactoryImpl

    public interface WebControllerFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBeanName()
      returns the name of bean as registered in the @id attribute in the stevia context construct.
      WebController initialize(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context, WebController controller)
      initializes a WebController using the spring context provided and the web controller bean.
